thread.section_title: HandmadePiece Art 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 HandmadePiece Art 的点评意见 | www.handmadepiece.com
thread.title: samuel lightbody
thread.title_full: HandmadePiece Art 的点评人 samuel lightbody

author: samuel lightbody
title: samuel lightbody
text:
Ordered a copy of a favorite painting of mine which is Renoir`s the swing.When the painting was complete I received a photograph ( digital ) for my approval. After approving the painting I asked that it be framed and sent to me. The framed canvas duly arrived superbly packaged and it now takes pride of place in my lounge. I can only congratulate HANDMADEPIECEART for it`s superb product and excellent service.
SAMUEL LIGHTBODEY
